Name: Sringeri Sharada Peetham
Description: Sringeri Sharada Peetham - First of the four Advaita Vedanta Matham established by Adi Shankaracharya. Located in Sringeri, Karnataka.

Name: Dwaraka Sharada Peetham
Description: Dwaraka Sharada Peetham - Second of the four Advaita Vedanta Matham established by Adi Shankaracharya. Located in Dwarka, Gujarat.

Name: Jyotir Math
Description: Jyotir Math (Joshimath) - Third of the four Advaita Vedanta Matham established by Adi Shankaracharya. Located in Joshimath, Uttarakhand.

Name: Govardhana Math
Description: Govardhana Math - Fourth of the four Advaita Vedanta Matham established by Adi Shankaracharya. Located in Puri, Odisha.

Name: Kanchi Kamakoti Peetham
Description: Kanchi Kamakoti Peetham - Important Advaita Vedanta Matham. Located in Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu.

Name: Udupi Ashta Mathas
Description: Udupi Ashta Mathas - Eight Matham established by Madhvacharya around the Udupi Krishna Temple. Located in Udupi, Karnataka.

Name: Mysore Parakala Matham
Description: Mysore Parakala Matham - Important Sri Vaishnava matham. Located in Mysore, Karnataka.

Name: Melkote Cheluvanarayana Swamy Temple Matham
Description: Melkote Cheluvanarayana Swamy Temple Matham - Important Sri Vaishnava matham. Located in Melkote, Karnataka.

Name: Ahobila Matham
Description: Ahobila Matham - Important Sri Vaishnava matham. Located in Ahobilam, Andhra Pradesh.

Name: Srirangam Ranganatha Swamy Temple Matham
Description: Srirangam Ranganatha Swamy Temple Matham - Important Sri Vaishnava matham. Located in Srirangam, Tamil Nadu.
